languages.text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке. И как наивно вверилась вам. И все же... Наше с вами сотрудничество помогает сдерживать не только врагов Дома Орселлио, но и моих собственных людей. Немногие осмелятся открыто выступить против Навигатора Вольного Торговца. Так что... Пожалуй, я продолжу и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока судьба ведет нас одним путем".

traits.locale_text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке.И как наивно вверилась вам. И все же... Наше с вами сотрудничество помогает сдерживать не только врагов Дома Орселлио, но и моих собственных людей. Немногие осмелятся открыто выступить против Навигатора Вольного Торговца. Так что... Пожалуй, я продолжу и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока судьба ведет нас одним путем".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."
languages.original_text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке. И как наивно вверилась вам. И все же... Наше с вами сотрудничество помогает сдерживать не только врагов Дома Орселлио, но и моих собственных людей. Немногие осмелятся открыто выступить против Навигатора Вольного Торговца. Так что... Пожалуй, я продолжу и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока судьба ведет нас одним путем".

traits.locale_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... Our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Not many would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How naively I followed in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a golden cage. And how naively I trusted you. And still... Our cooperation helps to deter not only the enemies of House Orsellio, but also my own people. Few dare to speak openly against the Rogue Trader's Navigator. So... I guess I will continue to guide your ship through the Sea of Souls — as long as fate leads us along the same path.
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那个人一直把我养在镀金的囚笼里。我曾一度天真地追随着那个人的脚步，也曾天真地相信过你。不过……我们之间的合作不仅有助于打击奥赛罗家族的敌人，也有助于控制我的臣民，因为极少有人胆敢公开反对尊贵的行商浪人麾下的导航者。因此……只要我们的命运依然流向同样的方向，我不介意继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海。”
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: “那个人一直把我养在镀金的囚笼里。我曾一度天真地追随着那个人的脚步，也曾天真地相信过你。不过……我们之间的合作不仅有助于打击奥塞罗家族的敌人，也有助于控制我的臣民，因为极少有人胆敢公开反对尊贵的行商浪人麾下的导航者。因此……只要我们的命运依然流向同样的方向，我不介意继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

languages.text: «Fui una ingenua al confiar en el hombre que me crio en una jaula dorada, y también al confiar en usted. Sin embargo... nuestra cooperación mantiene a raya no solo a los enemigos de la casa Orsellio sino también a mi propia gente. Pocos osarían oponerse a la Navegante de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente respetable. Por lo tanto... seguiré guiando su nave por el Mar de Almas... mientras nuestros destinos estén unidos».
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: «Fui una ingenua al confiar en el hombre que me crio en una jaula dorada, y también al confiar en usted. Sin embargo... nuestra cooperación mantiene a raya no solo a los enemigos de la casa Orsellio sino también a mi propia gente. Pocos osarían oponerse a la Navegante de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente respetable. Por lo tanto... seguiré guiando su nave por el mar de almas... mientras nuestros destinos estén unidos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「金メッキの檻の中で私を育てた男の跡を継ぐなんて、あまりにも考えの甘いことでした。そして、あなたを信用することも…それでも…私たちの協力関係は、オーセリオ家の敵だけでなく、私自身の仲間をも牽制するのに役立っています。自由開拓者の航宙士に 率直に反対する者は、ほとんどいませんから。それゆえ…私たちの運命が一致する限り、魂の海を航行するあなたの船を案内し続けることもできるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: 「金メッキの檻の中で私を育てた男の跡を継ぐなんて、あまりにも考えの甘いことでした。そして、あなたを信用することも…それでも…私たちの協力関係は、オーセリオ家の敵だけでなく、私自身の仲間をも牽制するのに役立っています。自由開拓者の航宙士に 率直に反対する者は、ほとんどいませんから。それゆえ…私たちの運命が一致する限り、魂の海を航行するあなたの船を案内し続けることもできるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Es war sehr naiv von mir, in die Fußstapfen des Mannes zu treten, der mich in einem goldenen Käfig großgezogen hat, und es war naiv von mir, Euch zu vertrauen. Und doch ... hält unsere Kooperation nicht nur die Feinde von Haus Orsellio unter Kontrolle, sondern auch meine eigenen Leute. Nur wenige würden es wagen, der Navigatorin {mf|eines angesehenen Freihändler|einer angesehenen Freihändlerin} zu widersprechen. Daher ... kann ich Euer Schiff ebenso gut weiterhin durch das Meer der Seelen führen, so lange unsere Bestimmung demselben Pfad folgt."
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: "Es war sehr naiv von mir, in die Fußstapfen des Mannes zu treten, der mich in einem goldenen Käfig großgezogen hat, und es war naiv von mir, Euch zu vertrauen. Und doch ... hält unsere Kooperation nicht nur die Feinde von Haus Orsellio unter Kontrolle, sondern auch meine eigenen Leute. Nur wenige würden es wagen, der Navigatorin {mf|eines angesehenen Freihändler|einer angesehenen Freihändlerin} zu widersprechen. Daher ... kann ich Euer Schiff ebenso gut weiterhin durch das Meer der Seelen führen, so lange unsere Bestimmung demselben Pfad folgt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai été naïve de vouloir marcher dans les pas de celui qui m'avait élevée dans une prison dorée, de la même manière que j'ai été naïve de vous faire confiance. Il demeure néanmoins que peu se risqueraient à s'opposer à la navigatrice d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} respectable, et que si notre coopération permet non seulement de tenir les ennemis de la maison Orsellio à distance, mais également à mon peuple de rester dans le rang... alors je me dois de continuer à guide votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes, et ce tant que nos destins seront alignés. »
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été naïve de vouloir marcher dans les pas de celui qui m'avait élevée dans une prison dorée, de la même manière que j'ai été naïve de vous faire confiance. Il demeure néanmoins que peu se risqueraient à s'opposer à la navigatrice d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} respectable, et que si notre coopération permet non seulement de tenir les ennemis de la maison Orsellio à distance, mais également à mon peuple de rester dans le rang... alors je me dois de continuer à guide votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes, et ce tant que nos destins seront alignés. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Beni altın kafeste büyüten adamın peşinden gitmem nasıl naiflikse sana güvenmem de naiflik. Gelgelelim... Seninle iş birliği yapınca sadece Orsellio Hanesi'nin düşmanlarını değil, ayrıca kendi halkımı da hizaya getirmiş oluyorum. Sıkıysa saygın bir Hür Tacir'in hizmetindeki Rotacı'yı açık açık eleştirsinler bakalım. İşte bu yüzden de kaderlerimiz uyuştuğu sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmeyi sürdürebilirim."
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and it was naive of me to trust you. And yet... our cooperation serves to keep in line not only the enemies of House Orsellio but my own people as well. Few would dare to speak openly against the Navigator of a respectable Rogue Trader. Therefore... I might as well keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as our destinies are aligned."

traits.locale_text: "Beni altın kafeste büyüten adamın peşinden gitmem de naiflikti ama sana güvenmem de naiflik. Gelgelelim... Seninle iş birliği yapınca sadece Orsellio Hanesi'nin düşmanlarını değil, ayrıca kendi halkımı da hizaya getirmiş oluyorum. Sıkıysa saygın bir Hür Tacirin Rotacısını açık açık eleştirsinler bakalım. İşte bu yüzden de kaderlerimiz uyuştuğu sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmeyi sürdürebilirim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
